title: Beautiful 3Bed 2Bath Condo for Rent
description:
Stunning and spacious  condo with bright, natural light and high ceilings. This recently renovated unit has an open-floor plan complete with hard wood floors, ample closet space, custom lights with built-in dimmers, state-of-the-art, energy efficient appliances, a private garage and driveway, and an individual laundry room.
The main floor includes a (1) master bedroom with a large walk-in closet (2) a modern bathroom upgraded with a rain shower and custom wall to floor design, (3) a second room with a spacious closet, (3) a walk-in pantry closet, (4) a full bathroom with custom-backsplash (5) kitchen with custom-built island bar, (6) open and bright living room (7) dining nook and (8) a juliet balcony.
The 2nd floor loft acts as a third bedroom (or additional living space as you see fit), which overlooks the living room and includes an extra large walk-in closet, as well as a modern, working fireplace.
Additional Rental Amenities:
-Ample closet space, including 3 walk-ins, 5 total
-Bespoke, automatic control skylight in kitchen with sensitive motor sensor technology for weather control, includes remote
-Stainless steel appliances include energy-efficient dishwasher and refrigerator with alarm, built-in microwave, gas oven and stove-top range, motion-sensor stainless steel sink faucet with adjustable nozzle
-Oak cabinets (dark) with stainless steel knobs
-Gorgeous, wood-framed energy-efficient windows built for insulation optimization and cost-effective temperature controls
-Custom blinds for windows
-Central AC/ Gas Heat; corridor thermostat
-Backyard access
-Brand new roof, 2022
-Condo Association maintains flower-gardens, trees, bushes, & grass, snow removal, and shoveling.
Neighborhood Attractions:
Prime location in the far North East near the Deleware River, uniquely situated between  Holy Family University and breath-taking Glen Foerd historic park. A short walk (less than 10 minutes) to the train station (Torresdale, Trenton Line), and about a 3 minute drive from I-95. Several top-rated NE restaurants and bars close by.  Minutes to Bucks County suburbs, Neshaminy mall, Neshaminy state Park, and about a 25 minute drive to downtown Philadelphia.
Neighborhood is quiet and welcoming.
Tenant pays all utilities
No smoking in building
Application fee $50
Cats and small dogs ok
Available for rent: October 1st, 2022

title: Delightful Home above Perkiomen Creek
description:
Right, Cheerful 3 bedroom completely renovated cottage home on large (55-acre) estate property. Tranquil and private location. Kitchen and great room on 2nd floor.
Home is "upside-down" to take advantage of amazing views of the creek. Upper floor with vaulted ceiling. Kitchen, great room, 1/2 bath and "bonus' room on upper level. Three bedrooms, living room and amazing, huge, bright enclosed and heated insulated sun porch on 1st floor as well as full, ceramic tile bathroom (tub and shower) and laundry room downstairs.
Utility/storage room at back section of cottage. The cottage also has a basement.
Wood floors on 1st level are refinished old pine; 2nd level is brand new Brazilian cherry hardwood. Stone patio and garden in front. This home is located on a 55-acre estate bordering the Perkiomen Trail and Creek with access to Perkiomen Trail and Creek from the property. New or newer
appliances include: refrigerator, dishwasher, stove, microwave, washer and dryer. Amazing house; Spectacular location.

title: Pet Friendly Renovated Town House with Yard
description:
Welcome to this beautiful cozy townhome with old world charm and character at the end of a cul-de-sac. Great two-bedroom property with complete privacy right in the middle of the city.

Phone interviews first before touring.

title: You are at the right place!
description:
Find the perfect apartment to cozy up this fall!
Our fully renovated apartments are located within the iconic Croydon Hall. Each apartment features amazing views and tons of light in addition to granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, spacious layouts, environmentally friendly PVC and tile flooring, self-controlled heating and cooling via PTAC unit, and bathrooms equipped with a rainfall showerhead, tying everything together with sleek, modern finishes you'll be sure to love.
Monthly Rent: Our 2 Bedrooms start at $1,550 and up.
Application Fee: $50 per applicant
Square Footage: Varies
Lease Term: Flexible - Please Enquire!
Included Utilities: Water, Sewer, Trash, Recycle
Tenant Pays: Electric, Cable/Internet
Schools: Henry C. Lea Elementary, West Philadelphia High School
Parking: Street Parking is Free
Storage: Indoor Storage Units Available for $24.99/month
Unique Features
- Loading Zone for all your shopping needs
- Secure Entry with FOB access
- Online Resident Portal
- Smoke-Free Building
- Conference Room
- Free Bicycle Storage and Free Air for bike tires
- Enclosed Community Courtyard with gazebo, firepit, lawn games, and grill!
- Recreation Lounge with TV, Games, Vending Machines, & more
The Amenities
- Lobby Staffed 24/7 with Package Concierge
- Elevator
- Recently renovated 24 hour Laundry Room with card or mobile app payment
- Fully Equipped Fitness Center in Building
- Recreation Lounge with TV, Games, Vending Machines, & more
- Playroom for the kiddies
Pet Policy
Pets are residents, too!
Two pets per apartment.
Breed & Weight restrictions apply*.
Non-refundable pet fee of $200/per pet.
No pet rent!
The Community
- Within walking distance to Baltimore Ave., there are a number of cafes, restaurants, shops, co-ops, parks, community gardens, & even a tennis court in the neighborhood to enjoy!
- There are 2 bus stops within a block and a half (#42 & #21) and the MFL station is just a 10-15 minute stroll.
- Prefer to bike? We've got you covered with indoor bicycle racks, too!
Interested?
Property Management works on-site and is available M-F 9:30A-4:30P. Evening & weekend tours can be arranged with an agent as well. Need a virtual tour? We can do so if you have an iphone or ipad. Contact me today to schedule your private tour!
Don't see your move-in date?
Ask! We're sure to have something you'll love.
*All animals must be approved by management prior to move-in and during the course of residency.
Photos are of our model apartment.
Availability is subject to change rapidly, so contact us ASAP to schedule your
private tour of our available floor plans!

title: Studio Apt Home with City Skyline View on Rittenhouse Square, Lounge
description:
The studio apartment home at 2407 is available for lease at this moment! This 400 square foot Dali studio apartment home on the 24th floor (of 26 floors) features large windows that face north and have a city skyline view. You may gaze upon skyscrapers like BNY Mellon Center, Comcast Center, One Liberty Place, and Two Liberty Place. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home has wood floors. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as October 7, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, Di Bruno Bros., Reading Terminal Market, Giant Heirloom Market, Aldi, Sprouts, and Whole Foods. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, gorjana, Paper Source, J. Crew, Philadelphia Runner, Allbirds, The Dr. Martens Store, Brooklinen, Scotch & Soda, Vince, Urban Outfitters, Theory, Tselaine, MAC Cosmetics, Sephora, and Nordstrom Rack. Relax with a manicure and pedicure at Philly Nails Bar or Coco Blue Spruce. Experience fine dining at Rouge, Devon, Parc, or Barclay Prime. Dine out at Pietro's, Aleksandar, Pizzeria Vetri, Luke's Lobster Rittenhouse, Tria Cafe Rittenhouse, a.kitchen, Spice Finch, HipCityVeg, The Love, Via Locusta, The Dandelion, The Continental Mid-town, or Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Savor a coffee at La Colombe, Vibrant, Ultimo, Alchemy, or Elixr. Have a beautiful French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Indulge in a decadent Sunday brunch at Green Eggs. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in ice cream at Van Leeuwen or Jeni's. Stroll across the park and then buy a baguette at Metropolitan Bakery or pick up a turkey club at Marathon on the Square. Grab scones from The Bakeshop on 20th. Catch a show at one of the many nearby theaters. Wander around the Rodin Museum or Barnes Foundation. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday from 9 AM to 2 PM. There is so much to do in this area!
Community Amenities:
* Package lockers
* 8,000 square foot resident lounge with free wifi
* Top-of-the-line fitness center with park view
* Sauna
* Pet-friendly building complete with a dog spa! Please note that certain restrictions apply.
* Fitness/yoga studio

* Nightly guest suites for the family and friends of current residents
* Elevator building with 24/7 front door attendant and 24/7 concierge desk staff
* 24/7 on-site emergency maintenance
* Laundry room featuring a single washer and a single dryer on every floor
* Larger laundry facility on the 3rd floor
* Attached valet parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by community and the cost is separate.
Apartment Home Features:
* Unfurnished studio apartment home on 24th floor
* Dishwasher
* Gas stove
* Microwave
* Disposal
* White kitchen cabinets
* Granite kitchen countertops
* Wood floor
* Large north-facing windows
* City skyline view
* All utilities included (except cable and internet)
Wondering if this home is still available? Visit our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com to check if 2407 is still listed under the Dali floor plan! Please make an appointment to tour with Michelle using ResMate, our chatbot concierge, on our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com 24/7. Live virtual tours in Zoom available!

Inspired by the finest five-star hotels, Presidential City's Washington Building is rich with upscale touches that embody contemporary urban class.more information, show contact info
Centrally located on City Avenue with direct access to I-76 and Route 1, Presidential City is ideal for commuters. With grocery centers, shopping outlets, and boutique dining, the neighborhood carries a variety of perks tailored to residents' tastes and needs. Adjacent to scenic Fairmount Park, Presidential City offers additional everyday access to one of the nation's paramount outdoor reserves.
Sora Pool Club gives residents access to a world class resort that many never have the opportunity to experience, let alone experience without ever having to have to pack a bag or board a plane.
Featuring three temperature-controlled pools, waterside cabanas, and a rooftop lounge, the pool club offers residents year-round resort-like access. Including an Olympic-length lap pool, lounge pool, and activity pool, water areas are tuned to match residents' moods and lifestyles. With massage, personal care, and holistic treatment spa services, a dry sauna, coed steam room, as well as tanning booths, Sora offers both wellness and relaxation.

title: Renovated Studio Apartment Home on Rittenhouse Square, Pets Welcome
description:
The studio apartment home at 511 is available for lease at this moment! This renovated kitchen features white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home has wood floors. This home on the 5th floor features large windows that face south and have a view of Chancellor Street. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as September 29, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, Di Bruno Bros., Aldi, Reading Terminal Market, Giant Heirloom Market, Whole Foods, and Sprouts. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Paper Source, J. Crew, Philadelphia Runner, Allbirds, The Dr. Martens Store, Scotch & Soda, Brooklinen, Vince, Urban Outfitters, Theory, Tselaine, MAC Cosmetics, Sephora, and Nordstrom Rack. Experience fine dining at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, and Pietro's. Savor a coffee at La Colombe, Ultimo, and Alchemy. Have a French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in ice cream at Van Leeuwen and Jeni's. Try the Rittenhouse Churro at El Merkury. Stroll across the park and then buy a French baguette at Metropolitan Bakery. Grab a babka or sticky bun from The Bakeshop on 20th. Relax with a pedicure at Philly Nails Bar, Nail Spa Bar, or Coco Blue Spruce. Catch a show at one of the many nearby theaters. Wander around the Rodin Museum. Shop at the fabulous farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday form 9:00 AM to 2:00 PM. There is so much to do in this area!
Community Amenities:
* 8,000 square foot resident lounge with free wifi
* Sauna
* Pet-friendly building complete with a dog spa! Please note that certain restrictions apply.
* Top-of-the-line fitness center with park view
* Fitness/yoga studio
* Package lockers
* Bike storage
* Amazing roof deck with fantastic views
* Nightly guest suites for the family and friends of current residents
* Elevator building with 24-hour front door attendant and 24-hour concierge at the front desk
* 24/7 on-site maintenance
* Laundry room with a single washer and a single dryer on every floor
* Larger laundry facility on the 3rd floor
* Attached valet parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by community and the cost is separate.
Apartment Home Features:
* Unfurnished studio apartment home on 5th floor
* Dishwasher
* Gas stove
* Microwave
* Disposal
* White kitchen cabinets
* Granite kitchen countertops
* Wood floor
* Large windows that face south
* Chancellor Street view
* All utilities included (except cable and internet)
Wondering if this home is still available? Visit our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com to check if 511 is still listed under the Dali floor plan! Please make an appointment to tour with Michelle using ResMate, our chatbot concierge, on our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com 24/7. Live virtual tours in Zoom available!
Rittenhouse Claridge
201 South 18th Street
Philadelphia, PA 19103
Price posted is for the 20 month lease term.
2-22 month lease terms available!
Rental rates, availability, and apartment home features are subject to change without notice.
Welcome home!

title: Small Park Model Trailer House in Philadelphia
description:
Small Park Model Trailer House in Philadelphia !! A front porch and screened in Arizona room have been added . A clothes washer with clothes lines is in the Arizona room . It has a riser at the front where a twin mattress sits , it is 6 months old . Also there is a round double leaf dining table and 2 chairs in the kitchen area . It has a swamp cooler and a very good window AC unit . The bathroom has a large closet , house type toilet , walk in shower , and a small vanity sink and medicine cabinet . The kitchen has a full size electric range and a full size fridge . The owner provides a small electric heater for the cold weather . Outside there is a giant mesquite tree providing shade and a small 8 foot by 8 foot metal storage shed that does not leak . It sits in a primo space in a small ( 18 space ) trailer park just off of Alvernon and Blacklidge , 2 minute walk to the city bus service and a half mile from Grant and Alvernon . We are a very quiet , safe , and liveable park with very good neighbors . We do not allow pets . We do require a $100 deposit . The monthly rent is $860 per month , plus water ( $20 ) , and electric usage fee , which is read off of the owner owned meter in the space , no need to contact TEP . The total at move in is $860 .If you'd like to take a look, be sure to leave your contact information...phone#, email, etc.
Thanks...

title: Newly constructed spacious house for rent!
description:
Newly constructed spacious house for rent! Special attention has been given to each and every detail in the building of this state-of-the-art home. Located in the Grays Ferry section of South Philadelphia, in close proximity to University of Pennsylvania, High way I-76 and the retail corridor, this home is surrounded by numerous new constructions and recent rehab projects.
This gorgeous home has 3 bedrooms with 3 custom bathrooms. The home boasts hardwood flooring, recessed lighting, smoke/carbon monoxide detectors, fire-sprinkler system, and is also cable ready. Enter the home to be greeted by a well-lit and spacious grand living room. Past the sun-lit grand living room you will find your state-of-the-art open galley kitchen. The beautifully appointed kitchen is outfitted with soft-close cabinets, modern Quartz counter-tops, contemporary backsplash, deep sink with chef's faucet, SS Samsung appliance package (dishwasher, fridge, range, microwave), and under cabinet lighting. From the kitchen via you will find the entrance to your private backyard. From the first floor, commercial grade Pine staircases (secured by custom railing) lead you up to the 2nd level of the house. Here the home presents a large room with a spacious organized closet, a huge bathroom with a custom vanity set, and laundry room. Following the staircase to the 3rd level, you enter to your own private oasis. The 3rd floor has another large bedroom, custom spa-like bathroom, and a spacious closet! The master bath boasts custom tile-work, dual vanity set, soaking tub and a designer rainfall shower. Take another step up the stairs to the pilot-house where you will find the access to your private dual rooftop decks. The home has electric and water lines on the rooftop, making it an ideal area to host parties and get-togethers. The finished basement offers another spacious bedroom or home office, custom full bathroom, and utility closet.
Extra included bonuses: Large High Energy Efficient windows, Built-in (Bluetooth enabled) speakers in living room & master bedroom, energy efficient DUAL zoned HVAC, organized closet shelving system, Nest camera in front and rear of home, Schlage keyless door lock in front, LED recessed lighting, digital thermostats, and much more! MUST SEE! Home has approximately 1850 SqFt of living space. Located close to public transportation, highway, nightlife, grocery stores, and restaurants. Ask us about our Move-In special for September 2022!

description:
Newly constructed spacious house for rent! Special attention has been given to each and every detail in the building of this state-of-the-art home. Located in the Grays Ferry section of South Philadelphia, in close proximity to University of Pennsylvania, High way I-76 and the retail corridor, this home is surrounded by numerous new constructions and recent rehab projects.
This gorgeous home has 3 bedrooms with 3 custom bathrooms. The home boasts hardwood flooring, recessed lighting, smoke/carbon monoxide detectors, fire-sprinkler system, and is also cable ready. Enter the home to be greeted by a well-lit and spacious grand living room. Past the sun-lit grand living room you will find your state-of-the-art open galley kitchen. The beautifully appointed kitchen is outfitted with soft-close cabinets, modern Quartz counter-tops, contemporary backsplash, deep sink with chef's faucet, SS Samsung appliance package (dishwasher, fridge, range, microwave), and under cabinet lighting. From the kitchen via you will find the entrance to your private backyard. From the first floor, commercial grade Pine staircases (secured by custom railing) lead you up to the 2nd level of the house. Here the home presents a large room with a spacious organized closet, a huge bathroom with a custom vanity set, and laundry room. Following the staircase to the 3rd level, you enter to your own private oasis. The 3rd floor has another large bedroom, custom spa-like bathroom, and a spacious closet! The master bath boasts custom tile-work, dual vanity set, soaking tub and a designer rainfall shower. Take another step up the stairs to the pilot-house where you will find the access to your private dual rooftop decks. The home has electric and water lines on the rooftop, making it an ideal area to host parties and get-togethers. The finished basement offers another spacious bedroom or home office, custom full bathroom, and utility closet.
Extra included bonuses: Large High Energy Efficient windows, Built-in (Bluetooth enabled) speakers in living room & master bedroom, energy efficient DUAL zoned HVAC, organized closet shelving system, Nest camera in front and rear of home, Schlage keyless door lock in front, LED recessed lighting, digital thermostats, and much more!
